name: The Stig
text: Nice folks! Very tasty handmade treats and gelato.

name: Ebonie Williams
text: The amount of attention and love that goes into these treats is INCREDIBLE. I had the toffee almond popcorn and it will forever be my favorite. The popcorn is light, evenly coated, and all around one of the best flavors of popcorn ever! Zion popcorn has the best recipes hands down!!

resp.text: Thanks Ebonie for the 5 Starz review. I appreciate your business at Zion Gourmet Popcorn Store. We look toward to sending you more yummy treats.

name: Vernon Herron JR
text: Great snacks and Gelato here. Love to see a teachers discount too!

resp.text: Vernon Herron thanks for the 5 stars. We appreciate your business.

name: Chris Hamilton
text: Great folks here, wonderful service and food. Reasonable prices

resp.text: Chris Hamilton we appreciate your business. Thanks for the outstanding 5 star rating for Zion Gourmet Popcorn Store.

name: CC G
text: The fudge is amazing! I had the chocolate and pecan fudge. My daughter had the oreo fudge! The owner is so sweet! She conversed with me for a while! A nice clean environment!

resp.text:
Thanks CC G for giving Zion Gourmet Popcorn Store a 5 star. I enjoyed serving you and your daughter yummy treats today. We appreciate your business very much.
Sandra Polk owner

name: Ellen George
text: The owner is super kind and friendly and everything I've tried has been delicious!(gelato, fudge, and chocolate) I highly recommend the blue cookie monster gelato if you have kids! The fudge is always soft and delicious and they have lots of unique flavours each time I visit!

resp.text:
Thanks Ellen George for the lovely comments about Zion GourmetPopcorn Store. We really appreciate your business very much. We do our best to treat our customers like Kings and Queen.
Sandra Polk owner

name: Taylor K
text: It's so much more than just popcorn. Don't get me wrong, the popcorn options are delicious, unique and homemade. They also have chocolates, truffles, turtles, bon bons, candy/caramel apples and fudge. I could write for days about the fudge. All homemade by the owner. Coconut, chocolate peanut butter, pistachio, raspberry, salted caramel... seriously all amazing! They will give you samples of most products to try before you buy. Not that you need to because you can't go wrong with anything there.

resp.text: Thanks Taylor for your 5 Stars reviews we truly appreciate your business very much. We look forward to servingyou yummy treats soon from Zion Gourmet Popcorn Shop.

name: Dawn Fields
text: This place is a wonderful Madison small business. The gelato and homemade candy is SO delicious and affordable. Great family atmosphere in historic Madison. Darling and the owner is a sweetheart!

resp.text: Thanks Dawn for the 5 stars review. We appreciate your business very much at Zion Gourmet Popcorn Shop.

name: Jenny Mayers
text: Sandra and her son Will are both so friendly and helpful and helped me choose what I needed for a gift for my hubby. Her chocolates and popcorn are amazing!

resp.text: Thanks Jenny for the 5 stars today. We appreciate your business very much.

name: Dana May
text: I was very disappointed to discover that Sallie's Whistle Stop Sweet Shop closed. Thankfully, Zion Gourmet Popcorn moved into it's location and kept the sweets selection from Sallie's. Zion Gourmet Popcorn offers the same variety of fudge, chocolate treats, bagged candies, and ice cream as Sallie's did. In addition to this, they have gourmet popcorn that is air popped and made on-site. They currently offer butter, caramel, cheese, and savory white cheddar flavored popcorn. The store was redecorated but still has the "cool candy store" vibe that it did before. My kids and I stopped in to grab a sweet treat for their new teachers for the first day of school. We also grabbed some popcorn for ourselves and it was delicious! We will definitely return to try out the fudge, ice cream and other goodies!! I love supporting local businesses and am so glad that Zion Gourmet popcorn has opened!

resp.text: Thanks Dana for purchasing  some yummy treats from Zion Gourmet Popcorn Shop.  We appreciate your business. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sandra Polk

name: Nickie Juarez
text: We've gone in store and also bought their popcorn online to be shipped as gifts. They are super friendly and nice. It's always fresh and the flavors are amazing. I'm very excited to try their fudge and Gelato the next time.

resp.text: Thanks Nickie for sharing your postive experience at Zion Gourmet Popcorn Shop. We appreciate your business very much.

name: Kaitlin Bailey
text: They have amazing popcorn and wonderful treats! Definitely recommend coming here! The staff is so friendly and always let you sample things! Shop local!

resp.text: Thanks Kaitlin for sharing your great experience at Zion Gourmet Popcorn Shop.  We appreciate your business very much and we look forward to serving you yummy treats.

name: Carlos Matamoros III
text: Great customer service!!  GREAT FUDGE!!! And five thumbs 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 Up for the GREAT POP CORN!!! This will be the place I order my pop corn from now on. I will be ordering stuff for my staff for Christmas. Thanks Zion popcorn for your quick deliveries and your fresh popcorn!!!

name: Keiana Mcnabb
text: My family and I love this popcorn. It's always fresh and makes for a great snack around the holidays. I've even given it away as a gift before. Love love love it!

name: Kristin Brewer
text: Awesome service. Gelato was amazing! Popcorn was delicious. I didn't try the fudge but I'm betting it's as good as everything else.

resp.text: Thanks Kristin for sharing your experience on Google from Zion Gourmet Popcorn Shop. We appreciate your business very much.  We look forward to seeing you  again for some more yummy treats. Sandra

name: Kayla Drake
text: Very nice people! Always there to help you when you need it!! Definitely will be making another visit soon! And the popcorn is great and the fudge is AMAZING! ❤️❤️

name: Christy Russell
text: The most amazing milk chocolate turtles!! Praline fudge is heaven!!!

resp.text: Thanks Christy for the 5 stars review on Google. We appreciate your business very much. Sandra Polk Zion Gourmet Popcorn Shop

name: Loring Brister
text: Friendly employees with good verity of ice cream and popcorn clean place to eat

resp.text: Thanks Loring we appreciate your business very much and we look forward to eating some more yummy treats.  Sandra Polk Zion Gourmet Popcorn Shop.

name: Lee-Anne Hooks
text: Terrific popcorn and gelato! Such nice people too.

resp.text: Thanks Lee-Anne for trying our yummy treats. We have lots of new Gelato and popcorn flavors coming this summer. We appreciate your business.

name: tyler brown
text: The customer service was very efficient. I enjoyed my pop corn in different flavors, be sure to experience this place you won’t be disappointed.

resp.text: Thanks Tyler we appreciate your business.  We look forward to you returning to Zion Gourmet Popcorn Shop for some more yummy treats.

name: K Turner
text: Looooooove their popcorn! So professional, friendly, and welcoming. You won’t be disappointed.

name: audriana elizabeth
text: The man working yesterday around 5, was very rude and asked a lot of inappropriate questions, we had the intention of buying popcorn but instead we decided not to because of his rude remarks and awkward persistent behavior, he simply could've answered our question. And asked if we were filming within the store multiple times which we would not do without permission. I will not recommend Zion to anybody because the treatment of potential customers was not immaculate and was extremely disrespectful.

resp.text: To whom it may concern, the students asked to perform or do a music video in the store. The questions I asked the group that came in was the name of their group and the song that they where performing. I let them know that they could possibly perform the video at a later date because things like that would need to be cleared by management. I sincerly apologize if those questions seemed rude. I also asked for the lyrics of the song they where performing or playing because lyrics or just as important as an amazing beat or musical selection. Much success to those students in life and the teachers teaching them.

name: Stephen Robinson
text: Amazing fudge and great popcorn!

resp.text: Thanks Stephens we appreciate your business very much. Sandra

name: Veta Joiner Rodriguez
text: My family and I love the cheese and caramel popcorn. They provide awesome customer service.

resp.text: Thanks Veta we look forward to seeing you again at Zion Gourmet Popcorn Shop in downtown Madison City .

name: Robin Nichols
text: Awesome ppl, great popcorn and candy..

resp.text: Thanks Robin for trying Zion Gourmet Popcorn Shop.  We look forward to seeing you soon to purchase your Cajun popcorn. Bring your daughter she will love the shop .

name: Quincy Kelly
text: I love the cheese popcorn.

resp.text: Quincy we enjoy seeing you eating our cheese popcorn.

name: Chantera Smith
text: Amazing Service!!! Very Pleased!

name: Shakira Lovett
text: Best gourmet popcorn in town, you will not be disappointed!!!!!!!

name: miaminic05
text: Very 1st visit.. Location was easy to find & welcoming, beautiful ambience inside the shop. The loving spirit Nykki made be feel special, catered to and like we were great friends. Her nail art talent & personalized service is a gift I will pay for many times over. If you want to your natural nails to be a showcase, THIS is the spot for you!!

name: Raychel Rainey
text: I always have a great experience when I visit A Touch of Art. They’ve got a large selection of nail colors to choose from and go above and beyond to give you a one of a kind nail design. Their jewelry and clothing is unique and beautiful, something for every style 😊 everyone is so welcoming and friendly! I would recommend this place to anyone looking for shopping, nail services, and massage all in one.

name: K P
text: The atmosphere, the person and the experience was so awesome and positive. If I had to wait a few hours, I would be ok. First time going and I could feel her spirit and it was amazing. Everyone needs to bombard her place of business. Won't leave the same-in a good way.

resp.text: It’s our absolute pleasure serving you... thank you so much for the kind words it means so much. We look forward to seeing you soon.

name: Marian smith
text: A Touch Of Art is an absolutely wonderful salon. The atmosphere is welcoming, the building itself is very clean and aesthetically pleasing! The owner, Nikki, is extremely knowledgeable in the care of nails and she is very thorough in the care of my hands and feet. She also has a welcoming and warm personality. I really  love the way my nails, hands and feet feel and look.

resp.text: We appreciate you so much and allowing us to take care of your every need. Thank you!!!

name: Gray Manor Creatives
text: This is my favourite nail studio, hands down! The service is impeccable and my nails always look amazing. Couldn’t recommend more!

name: Houston Family
text: Nykki is amazing at what she does... she’s very attentive. I love the fact that she does all her designs by hand and doesn’t even look at anything her mind is extraordinary. If you come you will surely be in for a treat!!! I love the boutique inside as well always have amazing one of a kind items.

resp.text: We greatly appreciate you and look forward to continuing to service you.

name: Shawndrika Cook
text: Touch of Arts has become the foundation  of my self-care. As a therapist I have been challenged to pursue my self-care and the atmosphere,  conversations,  and the accountability self-care,  then this is the place for you. When I  tell you I  always walked out refreshed... I do!

name: Magzbutler Cooks
text: Beautiful atmosphere. Beautiful experience. Definitely a great place to love on yourself and let Nikki admonish all of her gifts and talents on you!💕💕

name: Ros Stone
text: A purely Zen experience!   Peaceful, professional, efficient, and totally amazing!   Immaculately clean!  So much more than a nail shop!  It's an oasis for your soul!!  But trust and believe Nykki Houston is an artist and her canvas is your fingers and toes!  A masterpiece created every single visit!   Highly recommended!!

name: Ebony Moody
text: My experience at Touch Of Art is always AMAZING! The atmosphere is very relaxing. Not only can you get your nails created you can also shop! It's a one stop shop! If your looking for a great place to get yours nails created Touch Of Art is mostly the place!

name: 1Jesus1Answer
text: Great atmosphere and superb service. The BEST of experiences at each appointment.

name: Rachael Winston
text: A Touch of Art provides a phenomenal experience! You have the opportunity to get your nails done, your feet done, shop for jewelry and clothes, get a massage and experience an atmosphere of peace and tranquility. This is a one of a kind professional adventure.

resp.text: We thank you so much... we strive everyday to make your visit every time better and better each time 😊

name: Carlene Fitts
text:
Very nice,clean, and cozy, shop. Nykki is very professional and she does a Beautiful job on my nails! Nykki has a very pleasant attitude.  While getting my pedicure I enjoy sitting in the massage chair and being relaxed.  I recommend Nykki for all of your nail needs.

Signed a very happy client
Carlene C Fitts

resp.text: Thank you so much it’s our pleasure we enjoy serving you each and every time.

name: Shauntae Myers
text: I absolutely love A Touch of Art! Professional and courteous services! Awesome customer services! The shopping experience is amazing! A Touch of Art is an oasis from the mani room to pedi room to the clothing and accessories room. The treats and libations are to die for! What an experience it is each time I go!

name: K Carter
text: Best Nail Salon Experience Ever! I feel renewed and refreshed. Nykki has such a wonderful personality! Atmosphere is so warm and welcoming! Can't wait to come back.

resp.text: Thank you so much 😊 it was a pleasure serving you.

name: Tiffany Logan
text:
A Touch of Art is a Touch of Class,Relaxation,and Rejuvenation! This establishment is a whole vibe!
You feel the love through the walls !

name: LaShaundra Lewis
text: This place is AMAZING! From the colors to the smells to the products and service, I am in LOVE and recommend that everyone gives them a try!❤ You will not be disappointed😊

name: Jawana Whatley
text: A Touch of Art is a Touch of Class! Here you can indulge in total self care. The decor is well appointed and promotes a very serene atmosphere. Mrs. Houston doesn't overbook and you never fill rushed.  The conversation is great and it is truly one of my "happy" places. I also love the Boutique that supports other small businesses! This place and it's owner is🔥🔥🔥 #spameplease

resp.text: Thank you so much for allowing us to take take care of you. It is our pleasure to make sure you have everything you need ☺️

name: Mo Welton
text: A Touch of Art is the best mani/pedi experience that I have ever experienced!  Nykki is very professional and the atmosphere is always relaxing.  The one on one appointment gives you a personal encounter  without any interruptions.  The pedicures are the best.  The nail design are creative and personalized just for you!  The shop is immaculate and the smell is amazing, which gives you a positive vibe. I’m always excited about my next visit to see what type of design Nykki comes up with next.  If you looking for beautiful nails and toes, this is the perfect place; which also gives you a release of all negative energy!

name: Daphne Brownlee
text: Nykki is very talented. Her nail artwork ensure you have a design that expresses your personality. The atmosphere is very relaxing and serene. Definitely the experience you should have when getting mani/pedi services

name: Tombi Malissa
text: Nykki has been doing my nails now for over a year. She delivers excellent customer service and she really caters to your needs. She is a great artist as well and will have your nails looking Flawless and Gorgeous! She really takes care of her customers. I am very pleased with my nails.

resp.text: Thank you so much we appreciate you greatly and look forward to your visits every time!

name: Takira Petty
text: Every experience I have at A Touch of Art is phenomenal everytime I go.  Nyyke is very professional and has a spirit of excellence.   The atmosphere is tranquil and relaxing.  I also love that she has other vendors we can shop from jewelry, clothes, snacks & beverages. Make your appointment today. You will not regret it!!

resp.text: Thank you so much we appreciate you greatly and look forward to your visits every time!

name: Tori S
text: A Touch of Art is the best nail salon that I have experienced. The owner & my personal nail technician, Nykki, operates in excellence. Nykki’s customer service and her commitment to the health of my nails are remarkable.  I love the one on one experience with my recurring appointments. I also benefit from the salon being set up for wellness Pre-COVID. The cleanliness and limited clientele interactions were already in place.

name: Adrenne Johnson
text: Always a pleasure going to be pampered. It's a very comfortable and professional environment!!!

name: Janie Pilgrom
text: You must come and experience it for yourself.  From the time you enter until you leave you receive 1st Class treatment.  I highly recommend Touch of Art!  It has all your spa needs covered!

resp.text: Thank you so much we appreciate you greatly and look forward to your visits every time!

name: Phillip Drake
text: Nykki took great care of me. It was my first time getting a manicure, but she made it an awesome experience. I’ll definitely be booking again!

name: Ranisha Richardson
text: I absolutely LOVE each visit❤️Relaxing environment and professional staff!

name: Clarissa Kenty
text: I always have an awesome experience here. The personal touch is extraordinary . I love their creativity. They are very clean and provide premium customer service. If you are looking for a true spa experience, try them. TheY will not disappoint.

name: Shewana Mack
text:
My experience with Nykki every visit I have gone to have been amazing. I never been to a nail salon where not only you are pampered & served in an excellent way, but you are ministered too right where you are needing some encouragement, hope, just someone to listen to you dump and when you leave you are uplifted, with hope, joyous and renewed in your mind. I always looking forward to my monthly visitation with her. If you looking for an experience in an atmosphere of peace, serenity, pleasurable, check out A Touch Of Art. And btw the shopping experience there are first class. I have purchased some beautiful items. I recommend Nykki Houston.

Shewana Mack & Company
#IsupportExcellentBlackBusiness

name: lemar storey
text: Very peaceful atmosphere. Nykki is really good at providing excellent nail care. I actually fell asleep, it was so relaxing.

name: Kimmie Mack
text: I had an absolutely wonderful experience. Nykki catered to my needs and I was thoroughly satisfied with my manicure, pedicure and massage!

name: Segun Ajigbeda
text: My wife got me a pedicure here and Nykki has my feet SO smooth. As a “big guy” it’s hard to find someone that’s as thorough as she is. There’s been an Asian place that’ll be replaced with me coming here. Great atmosphere, timely and friendly.

name: Johnitra Price
text:
Over the past 5 or 6 months I stopped getting my nails and toes done. Well after coming to A Touch of Art..... I have a heart change!

I have never been in such a professional and intimate spa such as this one! From the time you hit the door you can feel that God is in the building! But the SPIRIT OF EXCELLENCE in which you experience during your appointment time is absolutely mind blowing!!

Even this post doesn’t describe the experience! You just got to come and experience it for yourself!

resp.text: Thank you for your heart felt words it means so much. We do our best to push excellence for everyone on every visit. We want you to feel beautiful and amazing every time.

name: Tarvares Crenshaw
text: Awesome  man really need to come and view the experience relaxing setting.....

name: Sheridan Dunn
text: Black owned business where you can get pampered. Come out feeling like the Queen you are. You can shop jewelry and clothing among other things you would definitely enjoy.

resp.text: Thank you so much we appreciate you greatly and look forward to your visits every time!

name: Tara Clay
text: Such a warm, nice, and professional atmosphere. So glad to find a blackowned business that will do my natural nails!!

resp.text: It’s always our pleasure to provide you with the best service possible... we appreciate you so much ☺️

name: Latine Jackson
text: Awesome Relaxing Experience very professional customer service

name: Tavares Cook
text: I love the services. Everything was just amazing. So fellas I recommend coming and allowing yourself the opportunity to relax!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much we appreciate you greatly and look forward to your visits every time!

name: Sharmene Smith
text: I love going to get my nails done by Nykki at A Touch of Art. She gives special care and attention to my natural nails. This place also includes massage therapy and various handmade art, jewelry, glasses, jeans, and more. Please make sure you drop by for a wonderful shopping experience.

resp.text: Thank you so much for allowing us to service you. It’s our pleasure to make sure you get everything you need every time. We look forward to seeing you soon ☺️

name: Karen Leonard
text: I'm Very Thankful For The Service. You Will ENJOY!!

name: M. French
text: Nykki is very professional and talented!!! My nails were in pretty bad shape after removing the acrylic nails but she brought them back to life!! My nails are so healthy and strong and I definitely feel more confident. I definitely recommend her services!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!! We are so thankful you are on a better path with your nails. We look forward to servicing you again soon ☺️

name: Sakema Porterfield
text: Excellent one on one service in a peaceful and relaxing environment! I absolutely recommend if you truly want to pamper yourself!

resp.text: It was a pleasure serving you... Can’t wait to see you again soon ☺️

name: Diana Wright
text: I love coming to A touch of Art , Nykki has brought me back to feeling like A beautiful woman again, I haven't gotten my nails done in decades, by trusting/allowing her the opportunity to do my nails have made me a believer that our natural nails can flourish..I definitely recommend her to anyone thats looking to naturally feel beautiful about your hands & nails..

resp.text: It was such a pleasure serving you... we can’t wait to see you again soon ☺️

name: Valencia Fisher
text: I really enjoy my experience every time. Nykki is the best!!!  Always professional and punctual!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much it’s a pleasure to serve you... can’t wait to see you ☺️

name: K. Linell Knight
text: My experience was simply amazing!!! I love the aesthetic and ambience!!!

name: Omar Young
text: The truth! This was the best experience I've had!

name: Amy Tubbs
text: Nikki is AWESOME!! You can't beat the service and the smile!! She is COVID19 READY!!

name: the CAREGIVER'S Life
text: Best hidden treasure in the art of professionalism, personalized attention, and positive vibes in Clay, AL!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.. we strive to provide a awesome experience every time.

name: Johnathan Mitchell
text: My experience with Watts Realty was great up until it was time to move out. I was charged an absurd amount for not cleaning leaves off the back patio area, even though I called prior to moving out and asked if I needed to clean the area. Not to mention, the area was full of leaves and trash when I moved in. There needs to be better communication between the landlords, so this problem does not happen. I will say the representative I spoke with was always professional and pleasant. However, it is extremely frustrating to be charged for something you were explicitly told did not have to be cleaned.

name: Jeannie Evans
text:
Watts Realty has managed apartments
for my family for 3 generations. They have a highly qualified, professional staff who have always done an excellent job to enhance the value of our property and keep it fully occupied, while keeping the tenants happy. I would recommend them to anyone!
Jeannie Evans

resp.text: Thank you for very for your review! It has been our pleasure for our company to work with you and your family to protect, manage & grow your real property assets over the years.  We appreciate the opportunity to be of service for all of your real estate needs! Thank you for continuing to utilize Watts Realty!!

name: Willie Frazier
text: Brett and Cliff does quality work and very professional.  I sure appreciate them. They always do a good job.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind comments! We will let both of them know your appreciation!

name: Lyn Bloom
text: I reported that had an issue with my door today and they came to fix it the same day. The maintenance department here is very responsive. Brett and Cliff are professional and respectful and never leave a mess.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words!

name: Tiffany Ellis
text: Me and my boyfriend are in the first week of renting here and found a few things we wanted checked on by maintenance. I made a request through the tenant portal on Sunday and today, Wednesday, maintenance came out to fix the issues. I would say three days is not a long wait time. He was very nice and listened to my requests and did everything he could to make sure it was all fixed. I’m very happy with how things are going so far into renting through Watts Realty.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Sheryll green
text: My Maintenence service request was taken care of within 24 hours by serviceman Brett, who was professional, nice, thoughtful and diligent in duties. Very kind and respectful. Did not create a mess and took care of each of my requests in a timely manner and was very neat and clean in performance.

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Valencia Banks
text: Brett is great he's always professional and never leaves a mess when he comes...thx

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review.  We will be sure to let Brett know he's appreciated.

name: Omarace Radford (GHOSTT)
text: Brett is very Professional & very courteous!!! Always fixes my problems whenever I call the Realty office!!! Very appreciative of his work!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words!

name: Stephen Copeland
text: Been with the company for almost twenty years, great management staff, very dependable, and fair with property management.  They will manage and make tenants accountable by law.

name: Jackie Williams
text: Liars*** rent to whom they choose never was my credit ran NEVER **

resp.text:
Ms. Williams.

Thank you for your review.  With your rental application you recently authorized Watts Realty to obtain an investigative consumer report from AppFolio, Inc., who provided us with the information regarding your credit history.  Because of privacy laws we cannot discuss in detail regarding your complaint in a public forum. However, you will be receiving a letter in the mail regarding this decision and contact information for the reporting agency.  You have the right to obtain a free copy of the report if you submit a written request to AppFolio, Inc. no later than 60 days after you receive the notice in the mail.  If you do not receive the letter providing you with the information indicated, please contact our office direct.

name: Tyiesha Jordan
text: Brett always helpful

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Rosalind Lewis
text: The clerk's at the front desk are informative and when requesting a look at an apartment , searching for the address on buildings caused tremendous stress. Numbers were different than given.

name: raven Johnson
text: I will not recommend them to anyone they are not understanding and they do not answer maintenance requests, emails, voicemails

resp.text: Ms. Johnson, we apologize for any inconvenience you have experienced. As you are aware, we have modified your lease, at your request, multiple times and have attempted to address each request you have made. We have attempted to reach out to you via private communication regarding your last request; however, we have not received any further information or communication from you since October 20 other than this negative review.   Please contact our office to complete the final paperwork you requested.

name: Free Forme
text: Horrible company. Stephanie was really rude. She told me that (watts) didn't want people of color in their homes. She hung up in my face repeatedly. I continued to call back and never was able to speak with anyone. This is beyond disgrace. Take your money elsewhere.

resp.text: Free Forme, thank you for your comment. Our company takes allegations of this nature very seriously. We provide equal housing opportunities to all people, regardless of race, color, religion, sex, handicap, familial status, national origin, sexual orientation or gender identity. Our staff are trained to be responsive to our callers at all times. Very rarely, a caller becomes verbally abusive. If this happens, our staff are empowered to warn the caller about any abusive language used before disconnecting the call. Our president, Chip Watts, is available to discuss this or any other issues you or any other viewers of this review may have. His direct line is 205-703-4277.

name: Priscilla Speller
text: I do not recommend this place at all scam artist to the max I done contacted this office soo many times about so many issues done had they contractor come take pictures of mold in my house bees nests etc none has been done son got stung he’s highly allergic that’s when they finally came to do something I have this huge while in my ceiling from the rain owner is trying to swap the dates and lie about a bunch of stuff even though there been paper trails witnesses etc etc place is just something else so I’ve been paying rent for a place i can’t even stay at smh management should be ashamed of themselves

name: Hollie Deaver
text: I submitted an inquiry email last week for an online listing at 5:30am. I received a response from each of the employees I emailed. The first response at 8:34am, and the second response came before noon. The experience I've had is flawless. Kaitlin and Michael are both extremely professional, viewing the unit was completely hassle-free, and every step in the application process has been clear. I highly recommend Watts Realty to friends, family, coworkers, and the public.

name: Xuan Huang
text:
We highly recommend Watts Realty Company.

Mr David Watts was our agent when we started to search for commercial property in downtown Birmingham. We were extremely picky in what we want, and because this was our first real estate investment, we were extremely cautious - for every property that interested us, we made multiple visits. In other words, David was not having an easy job being our agent, however, he showed great patience and understanding toward us. As the first-timers, we had A LOT of questions about properties, inspections, regulations, property management, etc, and David Watts always gave us satisfactory answers or referred us to other professionals. He assisted us in every step and met with us as soon as we sent in requests. With David's help, we found and purchased a property we loved, and it may not have happened if we worked with someone else.

Last but least, we are thankful the the entire Watts company crew who helped us arrange the meetings, look up some paperwork, buy the insurance, etc. We highly recommend Watts company and we are thankful that David was our agent.

name: Teresa Hill Berry
text: Most of their Apartments I do like however I've only known them to offer gas I don't want gas a lot of people don't want gas along with that I think the apartments are overpriced. I think that they should at least online tell you how much square footage and show the floor plan of the apartments as well. Today is at 8 at this review I would like to share this I have no intention of paying gas light water and rent. If I rent from Watts Realty and adding additional bills that I have not had an approximately 20 years.

name: Martin Williams
text: Watts is outstanding to deal with... they answer all my questions and their staff if very nice.  I Highly recommend them to either tenants or property owners

resp.text: Martin, thank you for your review...we are happy to be of service for your real estate needs!

name: Vincent (Vince) Bolus
text: Even after dealing with predatory management in the Tuscaloosa student housing scene for the last few years, the people at Watts Realty somehow managed to be even ruder and disrespectful than I could have imagined. It was nearly impossible to get into contact with a property manager while wanting to view an apartment (I called at minimum of 10 times and was never able to get on the phone with her once). The receptionist(s) is rude as well and always tended to rush me off the phone. When I expressed interest in talking to a property manager to the receptionist, without fail, the excuse was either that the PM was either "not in yet" (at 11 A.M., sure), or "on the other line." I will never rent from these people. Check the other reviews if you want more horror stories.

name: Cynthia Wilson
text: I went down to the office at the end of March because the apartment i wanted was available April 1. I had already seen the apartments due to a recent tenant and I like what i seen so I  put in a application to the address 705 1st St. S  in titusville. I used my real name which is Cynthia Jenkins. The lady at the desk informed me that the apartment wasn't ready yet but I told her that was  aware and just putting in my application early so it could be processing because I had really needed the apartment. I put in my application that morning and around 3 the same day was denied the apartment by a lady in your office. She told me they would be sending me the papers why i was denied and never received them. Very poor customer service skills need a better staff I would recommend them to no one also was told to edit my review and did because apparently now i'm lieing on the company and don't know where i applied to. Just ridiculous

resp.text: Ms. Wilson (Jenkins), thank you for providing us with your "real name" so we can address this issue to you. Our application process usually takes approximately 48 hours to complete. As such, we do not deny applicants on the same day.  We mailed a formal letter to you via USPS that explains what information was used in regards to your application. That letter also provides contact information for the consumer-reporting agency that prepared your Investigative Consumer Report. You have a right to a free copy of the report and to dispute the completeness of accuracy of any information in the consumer report with the consumer-reporting agency.

name: Justin Forbes
text:
If negative 5 stars was an option, I would choose that. David Watts is a property manager there who blatantly violated my rights under the Alabama Uniform Residential Landlord and Tenant Act as well as several articles of his own professional code of ethics as a Certified Property Manager. If you want to receive the respect you deserve as a tenant and have your rights upheld, do yourself a favor and never rent from this company.

Hi Michael,

It's nice to hear your rationalizations in defense of your younger brother's behavior, but I am more interested in the opinions of the Jefferson County Court of Law and the IREM ethics board.

resp.text: Mr. Forbes, we appreciate you taking the time to rate our company and provide a review.  After reviewing your concerns and your lease, we have determined that there have been no violations of the Alabama URLTA or the professional Code of Ethics to which our company adheres. Based on the documented emails and telephone calls between you, your wife (Ms. Galang) and our office, we attempted to schedule the shower leak repair multiple times during a time when you or your wife would be present. Unfortunately, due to several miscommunications by both parties (including third-party contractors unrelated to our company), this leak was elevated to an emergency status that would allow access to be granted without your presence and/or permission under the Alabama URLTA. Upon entering the premises, multiple other lease violations were then noted, including the presence of multiple breeds of pets that previously were not disclosed by you or your wife.  We understand your concern about our respect for our residents and their rights; however, the owners of the property also have rights under Alabama URLTA. After an extended period of time not being able to schedule a time when all parties could be present, the owner’s rights to protect the property from continued damage were enforced. We do appreciate your tenancy since mid-May 2018 and apologize that our relationship has degraded in the short time you have been a resident in Alabama. Hopefully, we may be able to better serve you in the future and avoid further miscommunications.

name: Emile Hughes
text: Great people, committed to doing a good job

name: Dawg Fan
text: On behalf of Bailer & Brock Investments, I would highly recommend Watts Realty. We are small company with several rental properties to supplement our professional income. Watts offers responsive, thoughtful, personalized (even for smaller clients), and wise advise to help protect our substantial investment. From natural disasters, to terrible tenants, to market knowledge, for almost 10  years, Watts had us covered.

name: gcouogluhgit.Jasmine vWilliams
text: Very unprofessional! I started out renting a home from them then one day out the blue they sold the home.. Like are you serious I pretty sure selling wasn't last minute for them so why not let me know as well. Not only that the people they sold to tried to jack up my rent and never fixed anything!

resp.text:
Ms. Williams,

We appreciated you as a Tenant during your time with us.  However, we do not appreciate the 1 star and misplaced Google review.  Please recognize the following points.

1)	Watts Realty does not own property.  We manage for many different third parties.  Your lease document would have the name of the Landlord when it was under our management.
2)	Investment properties are sold in the normal course of business every day across the globe.  We cannot control our Clients’ decision to sell their own property(ies).   Sometimes Watts Realty isn’t involved with the sale transaction, only to receive notice the day of a sale.
3)	Investment sales fall through in the normal course of business every day across the globe.  We cannot notify Tenants of the numerous potential transactions, especially when many never coming to fruition.  Due diligence periods extend to the date of Closing in many, many cases.
4)	The property in which you reside was sold over 18 months ago in May of 2016.  We promptly notified you of the sale, and have not been associated with that property since May of 2016.
5)	Due to this Google review, we contacted your Landlord just to inquire about the situation. We have no involvement or contribution with your problems with your Landlord.  We do not manage the property, nor are they a Client of Watts Realty. Please do not misplace your frustration on us. You need to work with your Landlord to resolve those issues.

name: Amanda Johnson
text: Thought I found a great property but took forever to get stuff fixed and now that I have moved, they are siding with the landlord to try and get me to pay for stuff that I am not responsible for. Stuff that was not even in the lease. I figured keeping my deposit would be enough but no they want more money.

name: Cris Galang
text: DO NOT RENT HERE. THEIR LOW STAR RATING SAYS IT ALL. These are horrible people who treated me and my husband with such disrespect. It seems like they are nice to you if you let them manage your property but they treat renters differently. It took them 3 weeks to repair leak from upstairs shower (obviously not emergent to them, didnt even bother following up the first week if the plumber they hired came and did the job). Then persisted in entering our home without prior notice even when we explicitly didnt give them permission to do so, clearly a violation of our privacy.

resp.text: Ms. Galang, we appreciate you taking the time to rate our company and provide a review.  After reviewing your concerns, we have determined that there have been no violations of your privacy outside of the lease terms you agreed to adhere by. After you reported the leak on Sunday, May 27, during the Memorial Day weekend, the leak was assigned to a third-party contractor for completion. Regrettably, the shower drain requires a special tool to repair and the contractor did not have such tool available at the time they were on the property on May 27 (the same day you reported the leak). Based on the documented emails and telephone calls between you, your husband (Mr. Forbes) and our office, we attempted to reschedule the shower leak repair multiple times during a time when you or your husband would be present. Unfortunately, due to several miscommunications by the parties involved, this leak was elevated to an emergency status that would allow access to be granted without your presence and/or permission as per the terms of your lease. We entered your premises on June 8, less than two weeks after you reported the leak, to complete the repair by the contractor while being supervised by one of our employees. After we entered your premises, several lease violations were then noted - including the presence of multiple breeds of pets that previously were not disclosed by you or your husband.  We understand your concern about our respect for our residents and their rights; however, the owners of the property also have a responsibility and rights to protect their property (and your home). After an extended period of time not being able to schedule a time when all parties could be present, the owner’s rights to protect the property from continued damage from the leak were enforced - which triggered other property rights issues that we are attempting to work with you for you to bring into compliance with the terms of our lease. We do appreciate your tenancy since mid-May 2018 and apologize that our relationship has degraded in the short time you have been a resident in Alabama. Hopefully, we may be able to better serve you in the future and avoid any further miscommunications or lease violations.

name: Amber Lese
text: Never recieved callback for property management. Gave info to two different receptionists, both said they'd call me back....Still waiting....

name: Bogart Daniel
text: Been renting from Watts since 2009. I appreciate the rapid response to necessary repairs.

name: Jean Hudson
text: Was VERY uncomfortable with the request for my credit card information to view property! All other realtors gave lockbox code or met us for showing. The property and neighborhood was mediocre at best. Scammers??

resp.text: We utilize an automated showing system called Rently for the convenience of prospective tenants on the go and don't have the time to schedule a walk through with our residential property manager.  The credit card information is for security purposes to verify your identity.  It is only a $0.99 charge that allows you access to up to 20 homes that utilize the Rently system or 30 days, whichever comes first.   If you do not feel comfortable using your credit card, please call us and let us know that is the case and we can provide you access by gathering additional identifying information from you.  If you want to walk through with an agent, please call us and schedule a time to do so.  I hope that clears up any confusion.

name: David Walsh
text: Very friendly staff. Answered all my questions and were extremely help. I didn't end up renting from them because they didn't have anything available in the area I was looking in. However next time I am looking for something, they will be the first company I call.

name: Tiffanyliiolhhhkn ijy Roberson
text: Please do not rent from these people. you will definitely regret it.

name: Brian Burke
text: i can't recommend my dog rent from these folks. not worth even calling them

name: Francine Jones
text: They have the best apartment to live in

resp.text: Thank you for your positive review - we hope you enjoy your time with us!

name: JJonathan Coen
text: Wouldn't recommend such unprofessional property managers. Couldn't even get a response to my emails.

name: zach garcias
text: Do not, I mean do not rent with Watts Realty. Don't even know why they still in business.

name: Tan Gamble
text: After viewing a property that they find renters for I applied. I received a phone call the next day saying that I was denied due to credit. So I called back and asked what the minimum credit score was and there is not one. So how can the a reason why I was denied?

resp.text: Ms Gamble, we have mailed a formal letter to you via USPS that explains what information was used in regards to your application.  That letter also provides contact information for the consumer-reporting agency that prepared your Investigative Consumer Report.  You have a right to a free copy of the report and to dispute the completeness of accuracy of any information in the consumer report with the consumer-reporting agency.

name: Susan Cotten
text: Called yesterday to ask about property management.  Talked to Raleigh Winstead who promised I'd receive an e-mail from him by 10 a.m. today.  It's 2:49 p.m. and no e-mail.  Hasn't returned call I made to him three hours ago.

name: William “Russ” Thompson
text: $100 application fee!!!

name: Exclusive Painting1
text: AAA
